title: Mystique - Looking for a PLAT+ Top Laner [PLAT3 TEAM]
body:
Hey, title says all - Mystique is looking for a PLAT+ Top Laner that will play serious in our ranked team. We are currently a PLAT3 Team with a record of 24WINS and 12LOSES. We also like to join tournaments from time to time to win RP and play serious, as well as having fun.  The requirements of being our top laner are:
- Good knowledge and use of the current meta champions [Lissandra, Maokai, Malphite, Gnar, Irelia]
- Skype
- 16+ Years of Age + Maturity
- No raging
- Be able to accept criticism in a GOOD way
- Listen to shotcaller
- Active: 6:30PM - 11:00PM [Schooldays] : 2:00PM - 11:00PM [Holidays and Weekends]
Currently our team consists of:
Top - [ ]
Jungle - Master
Mid - Diamond
Marksman - Plat
Support - Plat

If you are willing to apply and join this team or have any further questions, please add Arceo in game.

replies.body: why don't u just spam solo queue and find one yourself?
then what would be the point of the board 'Team Requirements'

most people don't even visit these boards, imagine if every bronzie came to the 'Team Requirements' board in search of a team? it doesn't happen because they add players from their solo queue games and ask them if they'd be interested. 

Half the time you don't know if this player is going to make the right fit with your team until you actually play with them
I'm a Diamond top laner. I am 18, don't rage, accept constructive criticism and listen to the shotcaller. I can play most of the time during the times you said.
